sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT huhyuna.* , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY HUHYUNA_NO) AS RNUM , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY HUHYUNA_NO DESC) AS RNUM2 , (SELECT YSM_MCLASS_NM FROM YSM_M_CLASS WHERE YSM_HCLASS_CD = 'G1' AND ODR = huhyuna.G1_GB) AS season , (SELECT YSM_MCLASS_NM FROM YSM_M_CLASS WHERE YSM_HCLASS_CD = 'G2' AND ODR = huhyuna.G2_GB) AS mobile , (SELECT YSM_MCLASS_NM FROM YSM_M_CLASS WHERE YSM_HCLASS_CD = 'G3' AND ODR = huhyuna.G3_GB) AS transaction , (SELECT YSM_MCLASS_NM FROM YSM_M_CLASS WHERE YSM_HCLASS_CD = 'G5' AND ODR = huhyuna.G5_GB) AS statement FROM HUHYUNA AS huhyuna WHERE 1=1
huhyuna.G1_GB = #schG1Gb#
huhyuna.G5_GB = #schG5Gb#
huhyuna.DB_INS_TM >= #schYsmStartDt#
huhyuna.DB_INS_TM <= #schYsmEndDt#
) A
WHERE RNUM2 > #firstIndex# AND RNUM2 <= #lastIndex# ORDER BY RNUM DESC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO HUHYUNA ( HUHYUNA_NO , REG_ID , G1_GB , G2_GB , G3_GB , G4_GB , G5_GB , YSM_DT , YSM_STT_HOUR , YSM_STT_MIN , YSM_END_HOUR , YSM_END_MIN , DB_INS_TM ) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(hyu.HUHYUNA_NO),0)+1 FROM HUHYUNA AS hyu) , #regId# , #g1Gb# , #g2Gb# , #g3Gb# , #g4Gb# , #g5Gb# , #ysmDt# , #ysmSttHour# , #ysmSttMin# , #ysmEndHour# , #ysmEndMin# , NOW() )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE HUHYUNA SET G1_GB = #g1Gb# , G2_GB = #g2Gb# , G3_GB = #g3Gb# , G4_GB = #g4Gb# , G5_GB = #g5Gb# WHERE HUHYUNA_NO = #huhyunaNo#
